narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a focused inspection for the 2.40 (b)(2) non-compliant item included on the report for the inspection
conducted on February 25, 2014.  The male Havanese puppy (#56), the Yorkshire Terrier (#078*362*588), the
Chihuahua (#099*512*809), the Shiba Inu (#103*871*293) and the Yorkshire Terrier (#105*052*527) had been
addressed.
 
The focused inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors
